summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 9th Avenue South and 10th Avenue South, each from Dearborn Street to Atlantic Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8017 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
